00030 void CnipolPulserHists::BookHists()
00031 {
00032    char hName[256];
00033 
00034    fDir->cd();
00035 
00036    sprintf(hName, "hAdcAmpltd"); // former adc_raw
00037    o[hName] = new TH1F(hName, hName, 255, 0, 255);
00038    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetOption("hist NOIMG");
00039    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle("Raw ADC (All strips);Amplitude, ADC;Events;");

00177 void CnipolPulserHists::FillPassOne(ChannelEvent *ch)
00178 {
00179    UChar_t  chId     = ch->GetChannelId();
00180    UShort_t adcA_bin = ch->GetAmpltd() + 1;
00181    UShort_t adcI_bin = ch->GetIntgrl() + 1;
00182    UShort_t tdc_bin  = ch->GetTdc() - 10 + 1;
00183 
00184    string sChId("  ");
00185    sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", chId);
00186 
00187    //DrawObjContainer *sd = d["channel" + sChId];
00188 
00189    // Speed up the filling process by getting the global bin number
00190    TH2* hTmp_ch;
00191    Int_t gbin;
00192 
00193    //hTmp_ch = (TH2*) sd->o.find("hTvsA_ch" + sChId)->second;
00194    hTmp_ch = fhTvsA_ch[chId-1];
00195    gbin    = hTmp_ch->GetBin(adcA_bin, tdc_bin);
00196    hTmp_ch->AddBinContent(gbin);
00197    hTmp_ch->SetEntries(hTmp_ch->GetEntries()+1);
00198 
00199    //hTmp_ch = (TH2*) sd->o.find("hTvsI_ch" + sChId)->second;
00200    hTmp_ch = fhTvsI_ch[chId-1];
00201    gbin    = hTmp_ch->GetBin(adcI_bin, tdc_bin);
00202    hTmp_ch->AddBinContent(gbin);
00203    hTmp_ch->SetEntries(hTmp_ch->GetEntries()+1);
00204 
00205    //hTmp_ch = (TH2*) sd->o.find("hIvsA_ch" + sChId)->second;
00206    hTmp_ch = fhIvsA_ch[chId-1];
00207    gbin    = hTmp_ch->GetBin(adcA_bin, adcI_bin);
00208    hTmp_ch->AddBinContent(gbin);
00209    hTmp_ch->SetEntries(hTmp_ch->GetEntries()+1);
00210 
00211    //((TH1*) sd->o.find("hTimeVsEnergyA_ch" + sChId)->second) -> Fill(ch->GetEnergyA(), ch->GetTime());
00212    fhTimeVsEnergyA_ch[chId-1] -> Fill(ch->GetEnergyA(), ch->GetTime());
00213 
00214    TH1* h1Tmp_ch;
00215 
00216    //h1Tmp_ch = (TH1*) o.find("hBunchCounts")->second;
00217    h1Tmp_ch = fhBunchCounts;
00218    h1Tmp_ch->AddBinContent(ch->GetBunchId() + 1);
00219    h1Tmp_ch->SetEntries(h1Tmp_ch->GetEntries() + 1);
00220 
00221    //h1Tmp_ch = (TH1*) o.find("hStripCounts")->second;
00222    h1Tmp_ch = fhStripCounts;
00223    h1Tmp_ch->AddBinContent(chId);
00224    h1Tmp_ch->SetEntries(h1Tmp_ch->GetEntries() + 1);
00225 
00226 }

00228 
00230 void CnipolPulserHists::FillDerivedPassOne()
00231 {
00232    TH1* hAdcAmpltd       = (TH1*) o["hAdcAmpltd"];
00233    TH1* hTdc             = (TH1*) o["hTdc"];
00234    TH1* hTvsA            = (TH1*) o["hTvsA"];
00235    TH1* hTvsI            = (TH1*) o["hTvsI"];
00236    TH1* hIvsA            = (TH1*) o["hIvsA"];
00237    TH1* hTimeVsEnergyA   = (TH1*) o["hTimeVsEnergyA"];
00238    TH1* hTofVsKinEnergyA = (TH1*) o["hTofVsKinEnergyA"];
00239    
00240    for (UShort_t iCh=1; iCh<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iCh++)
00241    {
00242       string sChId("  ");
00243       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", iCh);
00244 
00245       DrawObjContainer *oc = d.find("channel" + sChId)->second;
00246 
00247       TH2* hTVsA_ch = (TH2*) oc->o["hTvsA_ch" + sChId];
00248       hTvsA->Add(hTVsA_ch);
00249 
00250       TH2* hTVsI_ch = (TH2*) oc->o["hTvsI_ch" + sChId];
00251       hTvsI->Add(hTVsI_ch);
00252 
00253       TH2* hIVsA_ch = (TH2*) oc->o["hIvsA_ch" + sChId];
00254       hIvsA->Add(hIVsA_ch);
00255 
00256       TH2* hTimeVsEnergyA_ch = (TH2*) oc->o["hTimeVsEnergyA_ch" + sChId];
00257       hTimeVsEnergyA->Add(hTimeVsEnergyA_ch);
00258 
00259       TH2* hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch = (TH2*) oc->o["hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch" + sChId];
00260       hTofVsKinEnergyA->Add(hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch);
00261 
00262       // Fill one dimensional hists from two dimensional ones
00263       TH1D* hProjTmp;
00264 
00265       // AdcAmpltd
00266       TH1* hAdcAmpltd_ch = (TH1*) oc->o["hAdcAmpltd_ch" + sChId];
00267       hProjTmp = hTVsA_ch->ProjectionX();
00268 
00269       utils::CopyBinContentError(hProjTmp, hAdcAmpltd_ch);
00270 
00271       hAdcAmpltd->Add(hAdcAmpltd_ch);
00272 
00273       // Tdc
00274       TH1* hTdc_ch  = (TH1*) oc->o["hTdc_ch"+sChId];
00275       hProjTmp = hTVsA_ch->ProjectionY();
00276 
00277       utils::CopyBinContentError(hProjTmp, hTdc_ch);
00278 
00279       hTdc->Add(hTdc_ch);
00280    }
00281 }

00285 void CnipolPulserHists::Fill(ChannelEvent *ch)
00286 {
00287    UChar_t  chId     = ch->GetChannelId();
00288    //UShort_t adcA_bin = ch->GetAmpltd() + 1;
00289    //UShort_t adcI_bin = ch->GetIntgrl() + 1;
00290    //UShort_t tdc_bin  = ch->GetTdc() - 10 + 1;
00291 
00292    string sChId("  ");
00293    sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", chId);
00294 
00295    DrawObjContainer *sd = d["channel" + sChId];
00296 
00297    Float_t kinEnergy = ch->GetKinEnergyAEDepend();
00298    Float_t tof       = ch->GetTimeOfFlight();
00299 
00300    ((TH1*) sd->o["hTofVsKinEnergyA_ch" + sChId]) -> Fill(kinEnergy, tof);
00301 
00302 }
